entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
